feed.subtitle: A series of daily landscape photographs by Daniel Sofer, over 16 years running.

entry.title: Petals on the Ground
entry.content: As the cherry blossom season progresses, we are treated to a beautiful carpet of petals on the ground. Taken on the small Shirakawa River in Higashiyama.

entry.title: Kiyamachi Sakura
entry.content: Looking north over the small Takase River canal adjacent to Kiyamachi Street in central Kyoto.

entry.title: Paddling With Sakura
entry.content: We took a cruise on Osaka's O River near the Mint building, where the banks are covered with cherry trees. A great day for a standup paddleboard session.
entry.summary: We took a cruise on Osaka's O River near the Mint building, where the banks are covered with cherry trees. A great day for a standup paddleboard session.

entry.title: Tower and Bell
entry.content:
At Kiyomizu Temple in eastern Kyoto last night, looking at the bell (which we rang last New Years Eve), and Kyoto Tower in the distance.

This was a special spring evening event, where all the trees and pagodas are lit up.
entry.summary: At Kiyomizu Temple in eastern Kyoto last night, looking at the bell (which we rang last New Years Eve), and Kyoto Tower in the distance. This was a special spring evening event, where all the trees and pagodas are lit up.

entry.title: Evening Lights on the Saho River

link.title: Evening Lights on the Saho River

entry.content:
The banks of Nara’s Saho River (佐保川) have cherry trees in full bloom for a distance of 5km. Really a pleasant walk if you like cherry blossoms.

At night they had a small section lit with lanterns, which is where I took the top photo last night.
entry.summary: The banks of Nara’s Saho River (佐保川) have cherry trees in full bloom for a distance of 5km. Really a pleasant walk if you like cherry blossoms.

entry.title: Arashiyama in Spring
entry.content: A sunny morning on the Katsura River, with cherry blossoms just about full, and the Togetsu Bridge behind.
entry.summary: A sunny morning on the Katsura River, with cherry blossoms just about full, and the Togetsu Bridge behind.

entry.title: Sakura on the Kitano Line
entry.content:
This section of the Randen tram line in nortwest Kyoto is beautiful with the cherry trees in bloom.

The Randen Kinano line is one of two remaining streetcar lines in Kyoto, and transports you back in time when riding on it.
entry.summary: This section of the Randen tram line in nortwest Kyoto is beautiful with the cherry trees in bloom. The Randen Kinano line is one of two remaining streetcar lines in Kyoto, and transports you back in time when riding on it.

entry.title: Still Coming Out…
entry.content: Weeping Cherry Blossoms near the Togetsu Bridge, still not in full bloom. Recent cold mornings may have contributed for the late blooming.
